title: Minimal Reliance on Coal for Electricity
description: In 2021, Latvia produced only 0.00017% of its electricity from coal sources, showcasing a strong commitment to sustainable energy practices.

title: Low Prevalence of Underweight in Children
description: As of 2021, only 0.3% of children under five in Latvia were underweight, indicating effective nutritional and health policies.

title: Minimal Stunting in Children
description: In 2021, Latvia reported a stunting prevalence of just 0.5% among children under five, reflecting strong child health and nutrition standards.

title: Low Female Population in Age Group 25-29
description: By 2023, only 4.23% of Latvia's female population was aged between 25 and 29, suggesting potential demographic challenges.
